resources.string: Click to roll the die.\nEvery time you hit a six, you earn five coins.
Please enter wager in numerical format

Step 1:
Select a game type (2 alike, 3 alike, etc.)

Step 2:
Enter the wager amount using the following rules
 	a. For 2 alike, balance must be at least 2 times wager
 	b. For 3 alike, balance must be at least 3 times wager
 	c. For 4 alike, balance must be at least 4 times wager

Step 3:
Press Go, if you roll 2 alike or 3 alike at least as per your chosen game type, you win!
